Room.Name: Golden Dolphin Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Golden Dolphin Way south of the Golden Dolphin Inn.
Room.LongDescription: The Golden Dolphin Inn was named after the road and caters to the average crusader tracking their way across the wilderness. There are stables to the east of here just past the Hafnia Way intersection. There is a small Saloon called the Rusty Nail off of Main Street in the same block which provides a fairly laid-back atmosphere to drink and socialize without the hassle of being in the "in" crowd.
